product_name: Smith Lookout ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - Apple Tortoise Frame
long_description: The women's Smith Lookout ChromaPop Polarized Sunglasses give you sporty, sophisticated style with a refined shape and thin temples. Advanced lenses offer unmatched clarity and color optimization.
